Full Stack Developer

I am a developer with a passion for creating beautiful, informative, and accommodating services.


I've simultaneously found my home as a developer and become addicted to self-improvement - I'm always looking for a new challenge to push my programming skills further.


It's never been a solo endeavor, I've learned a tremendous amount from others and love working as part of a team. To facilitate that growth for myself and for others, I strive to code in an efficient and maintainable manner.


Projects

Check out what I've been up to.

Book Commons

Fullstack React SPA

My most ambitious project to date, a fullstack react single page app that aggregates a variety of public domain ebook resources into one convenient place. Allows registered users to save ebooks with a wishlist feature.

React : Redux: ES6 : HTML5 : CSS3 : MongoDB : Mocha/Chai : Bootstrap 4

View

Client Code API Code

Tabby

Web App / Backend

A full stack webapp to store links that are deleted after a set time depending on user set priority, backed by a custom built API. Developed my ability to build API's, create ODMs, and inteweave the front-end and back-end into a cohesive whole.

ES6 : HTML5 : CSS3 : MongoDB : Mocha/Chai : Bootstrap 3

View

Source Code

Wandery

Front End Web App

A frontend webapp designed to make it easier to plan roadtrips using Google Maps and Eventbrite. Developed my basic front-end skills along with API request and response handling.

Javascript : jQuery : HTML5 : CSS3 : Bootstrap
